item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: 3 Col's. Standard
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1499411551296{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1499419805527{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"]
Display your projects beautifully with unlimited styles standard or overlay style, list view, perfect grid, masonry or carousel styles, with classic pagination or infinite load, link portfolios to products in shop and even combine different styles divided by category. Rigid gives you unparalleled power you can't find even in multi-purpose themes.
[/vc_column_text][rigid_latest_projects columns="3" none_overlay="yes" portfoio_cat_display="yes" show_lightbox="yes" enable_sortable="yes" limit="12"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Home Simple

item.dc:creator: Althemist

[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1503325886286{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="3488" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="appear"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]

The World's Number 1 slideshow plugin comes bundled with Rigid theme. Not only you get it for free, but you also get it seamlessly integrated with the theme functionality. You can chose between Standard position below header, Custom "Above Header" position, Visual Composer element to place sliders anywhere in the page content and even a Revolution Slider widget.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1503215870640{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4328" img_size="566613" css_animation="appear"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Rigid is an innovative design house and fashion boutique.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
We're all about individual style.
We're obsessed by quality.
And we think shopping should be fun.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
It's nice to meet you.
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1505632520861{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #fafafa !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]
Our Story.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]
Our Vision.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses and designers.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]
Our Mission.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Consumption as a share of gross domestic product in China has fallen for six decades, from 76 percent in 1952 to 28 percent in 2011. China plans to reduce tariffs on a number of consumer goods and expand its 72-hour transit visa plan to more cities in an effort to stimulate consumption.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" content_placement="middle" css=".vc_custom_1503216059684{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

The Rigid Shop.

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]
Consumption as a share of gross domestic product in China has fallen for six decades, from 76 percent in 1952 to 28 percent in 2011. China plans to reduce tariffs on a number of consumer goods and expand its 72-hour transit visa plan to more cities in an effort to stimulate domestic consumption.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Shop Now" style="custom" custom_background="#333333" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="square" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frigid.althemist.com%2Fshop%2F|||"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4328" img_size="566613" alignment="center" css_animation="appear"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1503212838848{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_single_image image="3292" img_size="full" alignment="center" css_animation="appear"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Enhanced Product Options
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1504704663569{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1504706841019{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]
Rigid WordPress / WooCommerce theme provides a much nicer and intuitive way to display available variations on variable products. This custom built-in feature will help you select style for each attribute as color, image or label. With this plugin, you can present product colors, sizes, styles and anything else in a way much better than default WooCommerce functionality. This custom theme feature only adds more options to show product variations with custom swatches. It doesnt touch the default drop-down style from WooCommerce.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="3678" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1504707634373{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1504707040083{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]
With a user friendly and easy-to-use interface, you can add default colors, images or labels to each attribute in the attribute management page. It'd also help you pick the right style for quick-add attribute right inside the product edit page.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="See it in Action" style="custom" custom_background="#333333" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="square" align="center" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frigid.althemist.com%2Fproduct%2Ftest-product-with-really-long-name-23%2F|||"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row general_row_align="rigid-align-center" css=".vc_custom_1505045911865{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1505043611856{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]
The Rigid WordPress / WooCommerce theme comes with several options for product listing hover effects. You can chose between always-visible or visible-on-hover buttons, optional shadow effect on hover, image swap, image zoom or no effect for images and freely combine all of them as per your personal taste.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="All Options ON" style="custom" custom_background="#333333" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="square" link="url:%2Fproducts-hover-efects%2F|||"][vc_btn title="Visible Buttons" style="custom" custom_background="#c2a693" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="square" link="url:%2Fproducts-hover-efects%2Fproducts-hover-visible-buttons%2F%3Fproduct_list_buttons_visibility%3Drigid-visible-buttons|||"][vc_btn title="No Hover Shadow" style="custom" custom_background="#c2a693" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="square" link="url:%2Fproducts-hover-efects%2Fproducts-hover-no-shadow%2F%3Fproducts_hover_shadow%3D0%26product_list_buttons_visibility%3Drigid-visible-buttons|||"][vc_btn title="Image Zoom" style="custom" custom_background="#c2a693" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="square" link="url:%2Fproducts-hover-efects%2Fproducts-hover-image-zoom%2F%3Fproduct_hover_onproduct%3Drigid-prodhover-zoom%26products_hover_shadow%3D0|||"][vc_btn title="No Effects" style="custom" custom_background="#c2a693" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="square" link="url:%2Fproducts-hover-efects%2Fproducts-hover-no-effects%2F%3Fproducts_hover_shadow%3D0%26product_list_buttons_visibility%3Drigid-visible-buttons%26product_hover_onproduct%3Dnone|||"][vc_empty_space][recent_products per_page="4" columns="4" orderby="" order=""][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Enhanced Product Filters
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1504704663569{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1504707951651{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]
Rigid WordPress / WooCommerce theme comes with several custom sidebar positions, including a dedicated sidebar for product filters and custom AJAX (optional) layered nav widgets. You can easily place as many filtering options as you wish on shop and product categories pages and allow users to sort/filter products without page refresh in more convenient and intuitive way.
[/vc_column_text][vc_single_image image="3683" img_size="full" alignment="center" css=".vc_custom_1504708382583{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1504708152545{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]
All filtering and sorting options (including the default WooCommerce sort order and products per page) could be easily set to use AJAX or not, depending on your store requirements or personal preference.
[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="See it in Action" style="custom" custom_background="#333333" custom_text="#ffffff" shape="square" align="center" link="url:https%3A%2F%2Frigid.althemist.com%2Fshop%2F%23main|||"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: How to Keep White Sneakers White?
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497050715244{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1497050750567{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
First Rule: There are no rules. Forget the curling iron and the dress you cant sit down in. Our new collection of very pretty, very festive pieces are designed to shake things up at every bash, blowout and wedding on your spring and summer agenda. Heres how to wear them
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" general_row_align="rigid-align-center" css=".vc_custom_1497052801206{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image image="4282" img_size="1270x550" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1508074454051{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Summer 2017 Style Guide

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales.  
Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejeuvenate women. To make women look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous. - Coco Chanel
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
The "Do"s...
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
...and The "Don't"s.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1499693343554{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column][rigid_latest_projects display_style="carousel" columns="4" show_lightbox="yes" limit="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends. Military technology has played an important role in the fashion industry. The camouflage pattern in clothing was developed to help military personal be less visible to enemy forces. A trend emerged in the 1960s and camouflage fabric was introduced to street wear. The camouflage fabric trend disappeared and resurfaced several times since then. Camouflage started to appear in high fashion by the 1990s. Designers such as Valentino, Dior and Dolce & Gabbana combined camouflage into their runway and ready-to-wear collections. As we undergo a global economic downturn, the "Spend now, think later" belief is getting less relevant in our society. Today's consumer tends to be more mindful about consumption, looking for just enough and better, more durable options. People have also become more conscious of the impact their everyday consumption has on the environment and society. They're looking for ways to mediate their material desires with an aim to do more good in the world. A linear economy is slowly shifting to a circular one. Consumption as a share of gross domestic product in China has fallen for six decades, from 76 percent in 1952 to 28 percent in 2011. China plans to reduce tariffs on a number of consumer goods and expand its 72-hour transit visa plan to more cities in an effort to stimulate domestic consumption.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Embellished Spring Denim Looks That Are Anything but Basic
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497050715244{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1497050750567{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
First Rule: There are no rules. Forget the curling iron and the dress you cant sit down in. Our new collection of very pretty, very festive pieces are designed to shake things up at every bash, blowout and wedding on your spring and summer agenda. Heres how to wear them
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" general_row_align="rigid-align-center" css=".vc_custom_1497052801206{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image image="4282" img_size="1270x550" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1508074371152{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Summer 2017 Style Guide

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales.  
Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejeuvenate women. To make women look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous. - Coco Chanel
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
The "Do"s...
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
...and The "Don't"s.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1499693343554{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column][rigid_latest_projects display_style="carousel" columns="4" show_lightbox="yes" limit="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends. Military technology has played an important role in the fashion industry. The camouflage pattern in clothing was developed to help military personal be less visible to enemy forces. A trend emerged in the 1960s and camouflage fabric was introduced to street wear. The camouflage fabric trend disappeared and resurfaced several times since then. Camouflage started to appear in high fashion by the 1990s. Designers such as Valentino, Dior and Dolce & Gabbana combined camouflage into their runway and ready-to-wear collections. As we undergo a global economic downturn, the "Spend now, think later" belief is getting less relevant in our society. Today's consumer tends to be more mindful about consumption, looking for just enough and better, more durable options. People have also become more conscious of the impact their everyday consumption has on the environment and society. They're looking for ways to mediate their material desires with an aim to do more good in the world. A linear economy is slowly shifting to a circular one. Consumption as a share of gross domestic product in China has fallen for six decades, from 76 percent in 1952 to 28 percent in 2011. China plans to reduce tariffs on a number of consumer goods and expand its 72-hour transit visa plan to more cities in an effort to stimulate domestic consumption.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: What to Wear to Work When Its Hot Out
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497050715244{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1497050750567{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
First Rule: There are no rules. Forget the curling iron and the dress you cant sit down in. Our new collection of very pretty, very festive pieces are designed to shake things up at every bash, blowout and wedding on your spring and summer agenda. Heres how to wear them
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" general_row_align="rigid-align-center" css=".vc_custom_1497052801206{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image image="4282" img_size="1270x550" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1508074205698{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Summer 2017 Style Guide

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales.  
Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejeuvenate women. To make women look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous. - Coco Chanel
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
The "Do"s...
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
...and The "Don't"s.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1499693343554{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column][rigid_latest_projects display_style="carousel" columns="4" show_lightbox="yes" limit="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends. Military technology has played an important role in the fashion industry. The camouflage pattern in clothing was developed to help military personal be less visible to enemy forces. A trend emerged in the 1960s and camouflage fabric was introduced to street wear. The camouflage fabric trend disappeared and resurfaced several times since then. Camouflage started to appear in high fashion by the 1990s. Designers such as Valentino, Dior and Dolce & Gabbana combined camouflage into their runway and ready-to-wear collections. As we undergo a global economic downturn, the "Spend now, think later" belief is getting less relevant in our society. Today's consumer tends to be more mindful about consumption, looking for just enough and better, more durable options. People have also become more conscious of the impact their everyday consumption has on the environment and society. They're looking for ways to mediate their material desires with an aim to do more good in the world. A linear economy is slowly shifting to a circular one. Consumption as a share of gross domestic product in China has fallen for six decades, from 76 percent in 1952 to 28 percent in 2011. China plans to reduce tariffs on a number of consumer goods and expand its 72-hour transit visa plan to more cities in an effort to stimulate domestic consumption.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" general_row_align="rigid-align-center" css=".vc_custom_1497052801206{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image image="4282" img_size="1270x450" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1508073809732{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Summer 2017 Style Guide

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales.  
Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejeuvenate women. To make women look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous. - Coco Chanel
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
The "Do"s...
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
...and The "Don't"s.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends. Military technology has played an important role in the fashion industry. The camouflage pattern in clothing was developed to help military personal be less visible to enemy forces. A trend emerged in the 1960s and camouflage fabric was introduced to street wear. The camouflage fabric trend disappeared and resurfaced several times since then. Camouflage started to appear in high fashion by the 1990s. Designers such as Valentino, Dior and Dolce & Gabbana combined camouflage into their runway and ready-to-wear collections. As we undergo a global economic downturn, the "Spend now, think later" belief is getting less relevant in our society. Today's consumer tends to be more mindful about consumption, looking for just enough and better, more durable options. People have also become more conscious of the impact their everyday consumption has on the environment and society. They're looking for ways to mediate their material desires with an aim to do more good in the world. A linear economy is slowly shifting to a circular one. Consumption as a share of gross domestic product in China has fallen for six decades, from 76 percent in 1952 to 28 percent in 2011. China plans to reduce tariffs on a number of consumer goods and expand its 72-hour transit visa plan to more cities in an effort to stimulate domestic consumption.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Traveler cheat sheet: Summer Weekend Packing
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497050715244{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1497050750567{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"]
First Rule: There are no rules. Forget the curling iron and the dress you cant sit down in. Our new collection of very pretty, very festive pieces are designed to shake things up at every bash, blowout and wedding on your spring and summer agenda. Heres how to wear them
[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" general_row_align="rigid-align-center" css=".vc_custom_1497052801206{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_single_image image="4282" img_size="1270x550" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" style="vc_box_rounded" css=".vc_custom_1508073672338{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/6"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Summer 2017 Style Guide

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales.  
Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejeuvenate women. To make women look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous. - Coco Chanel
[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
The "Do"s...
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]
...and The "Don't"s.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content_no_spaces" css=".vc_custom_1499693343554{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 35px !important;}"][vc_column][rigid_latest_projects display_style="carousel" columns="4" show_lightbox="yes" limit="5"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1497052885578{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-right: 7.5% !important;padding-left: 7.5% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_column_text]

Destination Unknown

Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new "buy now button" technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends. Military technology has played an important role in the fashion industry. The camouflage pattern in clothing was developed to help military personal be less visible to enemy forces. A trend emerged in the 1960s and camouflage fabric was introduced to street wear. The camouflage fabric trend disappeared and resurfaced several times since then. Camouflage started to appear in high fashion by the 1990s. Designers such as Valentino, Dior and Dolce & Gabbana combined camouflage into their runway and ready-to-wear collections. As we undergo a global economic downturn, the "Spend now, think later" belief is getting less relevant in our society. Today's consumer tends to be more mindful about consumption, looking for just enough and better, more durable options. People have also become more conscious of the impact their everyday consumption has on the environment and society. They're looking for ways to mediate their material desires with an aim to do more good in the world. A linear economy is slowly shifting to a circular one. Consumption as a share of gross domestic product in China has fallen for six decades, from 76 percent in 1952 to 28 percent in 2011. China plans to reduce tariffs on a number of consumer goods and expand its 72-hour transit visa plan to more cities in an effort to stimulate domestic consumption.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

People have also become more conscious of the impact their everyday consumption has on the environment and society. They're looking for ways to mediate their material desires with an aim to do more good in the world. A linear economy is slowly shifting to a circular one. Consumption as a share of gross domestic product in China has fallen for six decades, from 76 percent in 1952 to 28 percent in 2011. China plans to reduce tariffs on a number of consumer goods and expand its 72-hour transit visa plan to more cities in an effort to stimulate domestic consumption.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Custom Content Project
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1507992753294{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle" gap="35"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]Fashion is always of the time in which you live. It is not something standing alone. But the grand problem, the most important problem, is to rejeuvenate women. To make women look young. Then their outlook changes. They feel more joyous. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" css=".vc_custom_1507992782905{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 8% !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle" gap="35"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4299" img_size="full" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" onclick="link_image"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_single_image image="4299" img_size="full" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" onclick="link_image"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1507992790220{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle" gap="35"][vc_column_inner][vc_column_text]Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new buy now button technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row_content" css=".vc_custom_1507992782905{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-right: 8% !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;padding-left: 8% !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle" gap="35"][vc_column_inner][vc_single_image image="4299" img_size="full" add_caption="yes" alignment="center" onclick="link_image"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1507992790220{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner content_placement="middle" gap="35"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text]

item.title: White & Beige Linen Set
item.dc:creator: Althemist
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The Challenge

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]Internet technology such as online retailers and social media platforms have given way for trends to be identified, marketed and sold immediately. Styles and trends are easily conveyed online to attract the trendsetters. Posts on Instagram or Facebook can easily increase awareness about new trends in fashion which can create high demand for specific items or brands, new buy now button technology can link these styles with direct sales. Machine vision technology has been developed to track how fashions spread through society. The industry can now see the direct correlation on how fashion shows influence street-chic outfits. The effects can now be quantified and provide valuable feedback to fashion houses, designers and consumers regarding trends.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
